g.text: This textbox (textbox 2) only accepts up to 5 digits.
This textbox (textbox 1) accepts up to 25 characters [a-zA-Z ].
This textbox (textbox 3) is transformedand accepts all characters (up to 300)
Click on this text to reset content of textbox nr 3
Click on this text to randomly reposition textbox nr 3
Click on this text to randomly resize textbox nr 3
